title: Riot fix your fucking bots.
body:
lol, this game is honestly getting on my nerves. I fucking say im going to smoke a %%% and I get chat banned. So you know what fuck this report system its bullshit. Like now im fucking pissed off. I lost honor level 2 and now im never going to get it back because the honor system is shit. I may as well fucking make a whole new account.

This was the only game and im accually fucking confused. Fucking 10 game chat ban. This is fucking r word

Colgador: so passive aggressive
Colgador: lol sure

replies.body:
> I fucking say im going to smoke a %%% and I get chat banned

No, you didn't.

So, what was your thought process when you edited the chat logs and posted them here? The chat logs are for you, so you can understand what you did wrong. Editing them, I can only assume, means you admit what you did was wrong. Then why edit them and post them here?

You are arguing the fact that it is ridiculous you get reported and penalized for being toxic, yet you advocate that other players should be penalized and you report them for being toxic.
{{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}}
Honestly that is the most calm toxic I've seen in a long time, like 3rd grade level.

1. You are playing on the North American servers, where that term has never been common to describe "cigarette". Further, I know many people from the UK and Ireland and all of them agree that term is just as offensive in those countries as it is in the US - and is only used to mean "cigarette" among rebellious people or those looking to toe the line of offense. Further, you are extremely lucky that you only got a 10 game chat restriction - that word usually merits an instant 14 day ban.

2. Even if you remove that line completely and ignore it, the rest of your chat log is certainly toxic and certainly merits a 10 game chat restriction, as was explained well by Cream Reaper.

>as was explained well by Cream Reaper.

So mute him.

You're on NA, don't say %%%.
Just don't respond.

"Colgador: renekton is braindead"

"Colgador: ur trash" followed by "Colgador: :]" 

"Colgador: I said nothing ekko" **K**

"Colgador: we should ff at a15"



"Colgador: youre very passive aggressive.

Colgador: its fucking annoying.

Colgador: had to mute that fuck." 

**GREAT, now your going to shut the fudge up, and your going to focus on the match your playing, and stop communicating with those trying to instigate you/piss you off**

"Colgador: lol ekko

Colgador: so toxic

Colgador: just shut up"

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 



"Colgador: ima go smoke a %%%" 

**No one cares if you smoke weed, do it before the match like all the other burnouts who play guy, saying your going to do this DURING the match tells me your afking, and saying this specifically means your trolling, because no one knows how long its going to take you to pack a bowl.**


"Colgador: shut your fucking motuh"

**You give advice that you don't follow, by the way this isn't great advice to give to your teammates when your trying to play a game together**

"Colgador: unmte for that" 

**You had someone muted, and you unmuted them for?**



**It has also come to my attention that you used the word %%%, which is obviously the short form for the British word for cigarette, you are playing on a NA server, you should have known that word is not acceptable, just as Australians use a few words we consider EXTREMELY OFFENSIVE as normal banter, etc, and secondary, once again, by stating your going to do something, your not playing the game, that is afking, and once again, no one knows if you smoke at your computer, no one knows if you go outside, how long it takes, etc, its basically a troll thing to say and do.**

> ya forgot this country is a bunch of sensitive bitches that flip their shit if you call them a fucking toaster

Says a guy who can't keep his cool & spams chatbox like a 5 years old. Irony much?

Changing servers won't matter much since the Toa conditions still applies in pretty much every regions out there.

"Changing servers won't matter much since the Toa conditions still applies in pretty much every regions out there."

{{summoner:14}}  That was lit.

"forgot this country is a bunch of sensitive bitches that flip their shit if you call them a fucking toaster"

Wait, your flipping your shit because you broke TOS/TOA and have to deal with the consequences of your actions.

"cause I like using those words"

...............

"I don't want to be punished for some bullshit feminist fuck."

"I may as well fucking make a whole new account."

No, uninstall this game, go outside and look for work or friends to do stuff with, its obvious this game is not suitable for you if this is how you treat people in-game, and how you communicate with people who are supposed to be working as a group. 

You also have a poor understanding of punishments you receive, and are likely to learn nothing from it, as you even stated your just going to make a whole new account.
